page.title: 05INSU INSULATION LTD.,PRUDHOE
page.content: Insu Insulation first came to Prudhoe in 1979 because it was central and the majority of Insu's work force live in Prudhoe. They make insulation for houses and other housing facilities like insulation for walls and the floor. They use Rockwool for insulating cavity walls and lofts and they also use fibreglass for insulating cavity walls and lofts. They buy their materials from England, Wales, Sweden and Denmark. They do a lot of insulating around Tynedale. They get orders for private houses and major builders. Insu own eight vans, two men work from each van. Lots of them work away for up to a week around Britain.
